titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 105th anniversary of the granting of United States citizenship to the people of Puerto Rico.
A resolution commemorating the 105th anniversary of the granting of United States citizenship to the people of Puerto Rico.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution commemorates the 105th anniversary of the granting of U.S. citizenship to the people of Puerto Rico and honors the contributions made by, and celebrates, the people of Puerto Rico.
